EmailTemplate.description: Email created for the current customer list that attended the webinar - no CTA
EmailTemplate.name: FastCasual Webinar - The Loyalty Iceberg.Email 1 - Thank you Email (Existing)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining us! Here’s a recording.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there,}}
We hope you enjoyed our webinar last week on The Loyalty Iceberg: Creating Human-centered Experiences <[[https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/youtu.be/8Go7WC6I3OM__;!!In4Qlw!usUZwLxzV50_w52WquxWS31760L2jL1OTYEAONbF8d7ygfoljLJTm0PMI-uNUxH0BtIvRThnayySBnc$]]>. Thanks for attending! It's challenging to transform the way you engage with your customers, so we hope you found our webinar helpful.
If you’d like to learn more about the loyalty iceberg, check out this free eBook <[[https://assets-global.website-files.com/61017fc978f56086c30ee25c/612644cf189b376e51063e6e_Loyalty%20Iceberg%20-%20Creating%20Human-Centered%20Experiences%20eBook.pdf]]> to explore each concept with concrete advice to create engagement that results in retaining customers, driving more revenue and beating out your competition.
Sincerely, NCR Hospitality
